TEXT.TITLE: FIRST BANK SYSTEM <FBS> SELLS LEWISTON BANK
TEXT.BODY: First Bank System said it has agreeed to sell its First Bank Lewiston subsidiary, of Lewiston, Mont., to two local bankers for undisclosed terms. First Bank Lewiston has assets of 101.4 mln dlrs at the end of the first quarter. Reuter
